records.where_clear: Reception and Identification Centre (RIC) in Greece
records.uncertainty_note: Specific Reception and Identification Centre (RIC) not identified, but context (Hellenic Police intervention, Operation Poseidon) strongly indicates Greece.
records.context_note: A riot occurred in a Reception and Identification Centre (RIC), provoked by Arabic-speaking migrants. Equipment of NGOs and UNHCR was damaged. The Hellenic Police (HP) intervened to restore public order. No Frontex staff were involved, and no injured people were reported.
records.evidence_quote: On 19.11.2017 at approx. a protest took place in RIC . The riot started close to the minors Section and it was provoked by few Arabic speaking migrants. ... The Anti-Riot Unit of the HP intervened in order to re-establish the public order. ... No information about injured people during the incident.
